allow: Bash(for file in 404.html about.html contact.html decoration-baby-shower.html decoration-elegant-entrance.html decoration-elegant.html decoration-fairy-tale.html decoration-floral-dream.html decoration-love.html decoration-shimmer-walls.html decoration-white-buttlerfly.html decorations.html index.html snack-carts.html snack-charcuterie.html snack-elote.html snack-fruitsnacks.html snack-maruchan.html snack-minipancakes.html snack-paletacart.html snack-snackcart.html)
